remarks: The property of being a non-irreducible (reducible) element in a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
irred.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
irred.2 $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
irred.3 $e |- I = ( Irred ` R ) $.
irred.4 $e |- N = ( B \ U ) $.
irred.5 $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
isnirred $p |- ( X e. B -> ( -. X e. I <-> ( X e. U \/ E. x e. N E. y e. N ( x .x. y ) = X ) ) ) $.
$d N x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d X x y $.
